headline: VCR: Consumer Discretionary Sector Dashboard For April
summary: VCR is equivalent to XLY in risk-adjusted performance, but XLY's higher liquidity makes it better for trading. Click here to find out why VCR ETF is a Hold.

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MGM and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: What a brutal six months it’s been for MGM Resorts. The stock has dropped 23.9% and now trades at $29.97, rattling many shareholders. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
